dict.acceptation: 逐步地，渐渐地；按部就班地；日趋；冉冉；

sent.orig: With increasing solid loading, density of AGC green body increases gradually, but strength decreases gradually.
sent.trans: 随固相体积分数的增加，水基凝胶注模法坯体密度逐渐增加，但强度逐渐降低。

sent.orig: The conception of gradually-vanishing asset (GVA) is presented are unused frequently while their value vanishes gradually.
sent.trans: 针对经常出现的资产闲置而价值逐渐消逝的现象，提出渐逝资产的概念。

sent.orig: Over time, managers are gradually alienated him, so that he can gradually lost their stage.
sent.trans: 久而久之，经理便渐渐疏远他，让他渐渐失去施展才能的舞台。

sent.orig: Autumn meaning gradually thick. Relaxed wind is stepping gentle pace to approach gradually.
sent.trans: 秋意渐浓。清爽的风踏着轻柔的脚步渐渐地走近。

sent.orig: Gradually, gradually, the time spent in the sun, only became a semicircle.
sent.trans: 渐渐地、渐渐地，太阳在时间的消磨下，只成了个半圆。
